loans.use: Installing a roof and a ceramic tile floor on the outside of the house

loans.name: Elsa

texts.en: Elsa lives Ahuachapan, El Salvador; she is a single mother and her 18-year-old son is studying at a local technical institute. Elsa runs her own sewing business out of her home and hopes to build walls in the inside of the home to create private rooms and ultimately achieve her dream of moving her business to a separate building. Elsa is happy that her son occasionally helps her with her sewing work and is hopeful that, just maybe, her son's father, who is a brick layer, will help her with the construction of the walls.

loans.use: Constuction of walls inside the home

loans.name: Aner Eliu

texts.es: El señor Ener Eliu Sánchez tiene la edad de 24 años habita en Veracruz, Ticuantepe en la capital de Managua,  es soltero, trabaja como guarda de seguridad y a la  vez da mantenimiento de limpieza en la empresa donde labora, vive con su mamá los planes es mejorar las condiciones de vida de sus padres ya que donde habitan esta deteriorado el techo lo cual desea cambiarlo en esta temporada seca, para cuando venga el invierno no mojarse, lo  cual va a comprar laminas de zinc; perlines, golosos, entre otros este es su segundo préstamo en Afodenic y esta contento por sentirse apoyado y beneficiado con estos prestamos los cuales ha podido sastifacer sus necesidades. Sus objetivo a corto plazo es poder seguir mejorando su vivienda.
texts.en:
Mr. Aner Eliu Sánchez is 24 years old, lives in Veracruz, Ticuantepe, in the capital of Managua, is single, works as a security guard, and provides cleaning services in the company where he works. He lives with his mother. His plans are to improve the condition of his parents’ lives since the area where they live is deteriorating. They want to change their roof in the dry season so that they won’t get wet in the winter. As a result, they are going to buy sheets of zinc and purlins, among other things. This is his second loan from Afodenic and is happy because he feels supported and benefits from the loan, which has been able to satisfy his needs. His goal in the short-term is to be able to continue improving his life.

Translated from Spanish by Avni Shah, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: To buy construction materials to change the roof on his house

loans.name: Agustin

texts.es: Don Agustin es casado, de 48 años de edd, con 6 años de servicio en la Alcaldia Municipal de Juigalpa como vigilante, su esposa no trabaja fuera de su casa, lava y plancha durante la semana, con el dinero que gana lo utilizan para los gastos de la casa y el salario de el es utilizado para pagar sus creditos y hacer fretne a cualquier imprevisto, sus hijos son adultos y no estan bajo su reponsabilidad solo una hoven quien esta estudiando la secundaria. Este cliente esta solicitando su 2do credito que sera utilizado para construir un baño y los servicios higienicos dentro de su casa con la intencion de brindar seguridad a su familia para no tener que salir al patio, ya que ellas en algunos dias quedan solas por la noche cuando el esta cumpliendo con su trabajo el que lo desarrolla unos dias de dia y otros por la noche.  Su primer credito tambien lo utilizo para mejorar su vivenda, ya que platea que es dificil juntar una cantidad para invertirlo en su casa, que con el credito esta consiente que cada mes despues del pago tiene que pagar la cuota que ya esta establecida.
texts.en:
Mr. Agustin is married and is 48 years old. He has worked in the Alcaldia Muncipal of Juigalpa as a guard for 6 years. His wife doesn’t work outside the house. She washes and irons during the week. She uses the money she earns for the expenses, and his salary is used to pay his loans and to fund unexpected expenses. Their children are adults and aren’t under their responsibility. They have only one child who is in secondary school. This client is requesting his second loan, which will be used to build a bathroom and sanitary services inside her house with the intention of offering security to his family so that they won’t have to go out to the patio. This is important because the women are sometimes in the house alone at night when he is working. Some days, he works during the days and other days during the nights. His first loan was used to improve his home, since it is difficult to put together enough money to buy foundation slabs. With the loan, he agrees that each month, after the payment, he has to pay the installment that is already established.

Translated from Spanish by Avni Shah, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: To build a bathroom and sanitary services

loans.name: Alvaro Antonio

texts.es: Alvaro es casado, de 37 años de edad, tiene 2 hijos, uno de 7 años estudiando el primer grado y otro de 2 meses, su esposa no trabaja, es ama de casa y cuida a sus niños, el trabaja en la Alcaldia de Juigalpa desde hace 8 años como conductor, esta solicitando su primer credito con la intension de mejorar las condiciones de una casita que adquirio de un proyecto de casas prefabricadas, el habita en casa de familiares, pero quiere irse a su propia casa, la cual no cumple con los servicios basicos y es por esa razon que quier construir una letrina, instalar agua y luz en la casa ubicada del costado este del Centro de Salud El Santuario, 25 vrs al sur, condicion principal para habitar su vivienda, caso contrario el proyecto retira la vivienda y el perderia el dinero que con sacrificios invirtio.
texts.en:
Alvaro is married, is 37 years old, and has 2 children, one is 7 years old and is in first grade and the other is 2 months old. His wife doesn’t work; she is a housewife and takes care of their children. He has worked in the Alcaldia de Juigalpa for 8 years as an operator. He is requesting his first loan with the intention of improving the conditions of a house that he bought in a project of pre-built houses. He lives in a house with family members, but he wants to move to his own house, which doesn’t have basic services. Because of this, he wants to build a bathroom, install running water, and electricity in the house, which is located on the east side of The Sanctuary Health Center, 25 yards to the south. This is necessary in order to live in the home. The other case is that he withdraws from the house and loses the money he invested.

Translated from Spanish by Avni Shah, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: To build a bathroom and install running water and electricity

loans.name: Martha Lorena

texts.es: La señora Martha B. Espinosa, tiene la edad de 38 años habita en el barrio la Francia N 2 ubicado en municipio de Ticuantepe, junto a su esposo el cual le apoya con los gastos del hogar, ellos tienen a su cargo una hija de 9 años; la señora desde hace diez años de dedica a la agricultura, con sus propios esfuerzos ha logrado establecer una manzana de piña, lo cual en estos momentos no tiene los recursos para poder aplicar los insumos necesarios. Es por eso que con esta solicitud de préstamo va comprar fertilizantes para que sea una buena producción y poder venderla a mejor precio.
texts.en:
Mrs. Martha B. Espinosa is 38 years old and lives in the neighborhood Francia N 2, located in the town of Ticuantepe, with her husband, who supports her with the household expenses. They take care of their nine-year-old daughter. For ten years, Mrs. Martha works on agriculture. With her own effort, she has succeeded in establishing plots of pineapples. At this time, she doesn’t have the resources to apply the necessary supplies for her crops. As a result, with this loan, she will buy fertilizers so that she can produce more and will be able to sell at a better price.

Translated from Spanish by Avni Shah, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: To buy fertilizers to improve her production

loans.name: Gloria Eusebia

texts.es: Doña Gloria es soltera, de 52 años de edad, trabajadora del Hospital Asuncion con 28 años de servicio como enfermera profesional, tiene un hijo el que esta realziando estudios universitarios, esta solicitando su 7mo credito para utilizarlo en poner ceramica al piso de su casa (sala, cocina, comedor), ademas si es posible repellar una pared de la cocina, todos sus creditos los ha cancelado en tiempo y forma, a pesar que tiene bajo su responsabilidad a su mamá quien despues de un derrame perdio las facultades de caminar y ella y su hijo estan a su cuidado, casi siempre tiene turnos por la noche para atender durante el dia a su mamá, tiene una hermana en E.E.U.U., quien en caso de dificultad le apoya para gastos de medicametnos, plantea doña Gloria que sus deseos son tener todas las condiciones y una vivienda digna para su hijo y su familia.
texts.en:
Doña Gloria is single, aged 52, a worker in Asuncion Hospital with 28 years of service as a professional nurse. She has a son who is undertaking university studies. She is asking for her seventh credit in order to tile the floor in her house (living room, kitchen, dining room) and also if it is possible to repair a wall in the kitchen. All her credits have been repaid on time and in full, despite having responsibility for her mother who after a stroke lost her ability to walk. She and Gloria's sun are under her care, so she almost always works night shifts in order to be able wait on her mother during the day. She has a sister in the USA who in times of hardship helps her with the expense of the medications. Gloria suggests that her dream is to have all the quality of life and a dignified home for her son and her family.

Translated from Spanish by Katy Long, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: Tile and whitewash house

loans.name: Zenayda

texts.es: Doña Zenayda es casada, de 45 años de edad, tiene 2 hijos, ellos no estudian, pero trabajan y le ayudan con los gastos del hogar; Zenayda trabaja como responsable del cementerio de Juigalpa desde hace 21 años, su esposo trabaja en el hospital como camillero y tambien apoya en el hogar, esta solicitando su 8vo credito para utilizarlo en mejorar su vivienda como es cambiar el techo y levantar paredes de su cocina, sus creditos anteriores los ha pagado en tiempo y forma, siendo hasta el momento tipificada como cliente "A", todos sus creditos los ha utilizado para el mejoramiento de su vivienda hasta llegar a poseer una vivienda con algunas condiciones, faltando todavia mucho por hacer, pero esta segura que con sus creditos llegara  a cumplir con el su sueño.
texts.en:
Doña Zenayda is married, aged 45, has 2 children. They aren't studying, but they work and help with the household expenses. Zenyada has worked as a cemetery warden in Juigalpa for the last 21 years, her husband works in the hospital as a stretcher-bearer and also helps in the home. She is asking for her eighth credit to use it in order to improve her house by changing the roof and putting up kitchen walls. Her previous loans have been paid back on time and in full, so she is classified as an "A" grade client. All her loans have been used to improve her house in order that she may possess a well-built house. There remains a lot to do, but she is sure that with the credits she will achieve her dream.

Translated from Spanish by Katy Long, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: Change roof and construct walls

loans.name: Norma Isabel

texts.es: Norma Isabel es madre soltera de 28 años de edad, tiene 2 niños de 6 y 11 años, ambos estudian la primaria, trabaja en la zona rural de Santo Tomas en la comarca El Guabo, se traslada los domingos regresando el viernes por la tarde, esta solicitando su primer credito, el que destinara para la construccion de un dormitorio (levantar paredes), esta estudiando el 3er año de la universidad los sabados en Santo Tomas, su mamá le cuida los niños mientras trabaja y estudia, plantea que desea superarse para en el futuro poder dar mejores condiciones de vida a sus hijos, ademas se ha comprometido a pagar su credito de acuerdo a lo pactado, pues desea demostrar a la institucion que es una persona responsable y buena pagadora.
texts.en:
Norma Isabel is a single mother aged 28. She has 2 children aged 6 and 11, both of whom are in primary school. she works in the rural zone of Santo Tomas in the region of El Guabo,travelling on Sunday and returning on Friday afternoon. She is asking for her first loan, which will be used to construct a bedroom (putting-up walls). She is studying in the third year of university on Saturdays in Santo Tomas: her mother looks after the children while she works and studies. She explains that her overwhelming desire for the future is to be able to give her children a better quality of life. She has promised to repay her loan in accordance with the terms and conditions, because she wants to show the institution that she is a responsible person and a good payer.

Translated from Spanish by Katy Long, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: Construction of a bedroom

loans.name: Deylin Del Socorro

texts.es: Deylin  es soltera, de 26 años de edad, tiene 3 hijos (4 meses, 2 y 9 años), el mayorcito estudia el 2do grado, ella trabaja como directora del Nerpe Corazon de Jesus con 8 años de servicio, viaja diario a la zona rural de 6:00 a.m. a 7:00 p.m., sus hijos se los cuida una hermana y el compañero cuando no tiene trabajo, esta solicitando su 2do credito y lo utilizara para levantar paredes de un cuarto que esta forrado con plastico y zinc, ademas comprar la puerta de entrada de su vivienda, piensa que con este credito podra cumplir su meta, ya que su compañero es albañil y el construira el cuarto, su credito anterior lo pago en tiempo y forma y ha hecho compromisos formales de continuar con su buen record crediticio.
texts.en:
Deylin is single, 26 years old and has 3 children (4 months, 2 and 9 years). The oldest is in 2nd grade. She has worked as a director at Nerpe Corazon de Jesus for 8 years. She travels to the countryside each day from 6:00 am to 7:00 pm. One of her sisters, or her partner when he does not have work, take care of the children. This is the second loan she requests and it will be used to raise the walls in a room that is covered in plastic as well as buy a door for the entrance to her house. She thinks that with this loan she will be able to reach her goal since her partner is a bricklayer and will build the room. Her previous loan was paid off on time and she has committed to continue her good credit record.

Translated from Spanish by Molly Puglisi, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: Raise the walls in a room and buy a door for the entrance to her house.

loans.name: Reyna Isabel

texts.es: Reyna Isabel es casada, de 28 años de edad, tiene 2 hijos: uno de 4 meses y otro de 8 años de edad en 4to grado, trabaja para la zona rural como directora con 4 años de servicio, sale a las 6:00 a.m. y regresa a las 6:30 p.m., sus niños son cuidados por una hermana, su esposo se fue a Costa Rica en busca de mejores horizontes, está trabajando y le envia 70 dólares mensuales para hacerle frente a la dificil situacion economica que se esta enfrentando, esta solicitando su 2do credito y lo utilizara para repellar su dormitorio, acondicionar el baño y poner la puerta de su dormitorio, si el prestamo no es suficiente, con lo que su esposo le envia quiezas pueda teminar la obra que se ha propuesto.
texts.en:
Reyna Isabel is married, 28 years old, and has two children: one four months old and the other eight months old in fourth grade. She works for the rural zone as a director with four years of service, she leaves at 6 a.m. and returns at 6:30 p.m. Her children are cared for by a sister, her husband went to Costa Rica in search of better horizons, and is working and sends her 70 dollars monthly to make her move forward with the difficult economic situation she is facing. She is asking for her second loan and she will use it to repair her bedroom, condition the bedroom and put a door on her bedroom, if the loan is not sufficient, with what her husband sends her she may be able to finish the work she has proposed.

Translated from Spanish by Zach Frey, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: Home improvements

loans.name: Josefa

texts.es: La profesora Josefa es soltera, de 45 años de edad, 2 hijos de 5 y 15 años, la ultima con el 2do año de secundaria, trabaja en la zona rural como directora de un núcleo rural, trasladandose los domingos y regresando los viernes, con 15 años de servicio, sus hijos los deja con su mamá quien se las ha cuidado siempre, esta solicitando su 2do credito el que utlizara para realizar diferentes actividades si el dinero alcanza, como son: construccion de letrina, repello de casa, instalacion de agua y energia electrica; su primer credito tambien lo utilizo en mejora de su vivienda y lo cancelo en tiempo y forma, desea llegar a contar con una vivienda digna para sus hijos, su compañero se traslado a Costa Rica en busca de trabajo, le envia mensual entre 50 y 70 dólares para apoyar los gastos del hogar.
texts.en:
Ms. Josefa is single, 45 years old, and has two children, 5 and 15 years old, the last one in his second year of high school. She works in the rural zone as director of a rural nucleus, leaving Sundays and returning Fridays, with 15 years of service. She leaves her children with her mother who has always taken care of them. She is asking for her second loan which she will use to realize different activities if the money is raised, which are: constructing a bathroom, repairing the house, installing water and electricity. Her first load was also used to improve her life and she paid in on time and in good form. She wants to arrive at a dignified living for her children, her partner left to Costa Rica in search of work, and he sends her between 50 and 70 dollars monthly to support the household expenses.

Translated from Spanish by Zach Frey, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: Building a bathroom, repairing the house, adding electricity and water

loans.name: Elizabeth Del Carmen

texts.es: La señora Elizabeth G. tiene la edad de 42 años habita en el barrio San Caralampio ubicado en la Concepción, junto a su esposo, el cual le apoya con los gastos del hogar, sus hijos son independientes todos están casados. Los planes hacia su familia es mejorar las condiciones de vida para que un futuro puedan gozar del esfuerzo que han logrado durante veinte años  trabajando en la agricultura. Ella inicio con el apoyo de sus padres, los sueños de doña Elizabeth es lograr establecer una manzana de piña mas para obtener mas ingresos lo cual  espera lograr con la solicitud de crédito, esta es su cuarta solicitud en Afodenic lo cual es de gran beneficios para su familia el tener un apoyo financiero a plazo factible a su bolsillos
texts.en:
Mrs. Elizabeth G. is 42 years old and lives in the San Caralampio neighborhood of La Concepción. She lives with her husband who helps her with household expenses. Her children are all married and living on their own. The plans for her family are to improve the standard of living so that in the future they can enjoy their efforts from twenty years of work in agriculture. She started with help from her parents. Mrs. Elizabeth's dream is to have 1.75 acres more of pineapples to have more income. She hopes to manage this with the loan she has requested. This is her fourth request at Afodenic, which is very beneficial to her family, having financial support with a feasible payment for them.

Translated from Spanish by Susan Haynes, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: Purchase 1.75 acres of land to grow more pineapple

loans.name: I Nyoman Suanda

texts.id: Keadaan ekonomi yang semakin menyudutkan masyarakat ke arah yang semakin berat membuat setiap orang mau tidak mau harus lebih tekun dalam berusaha. Termasuk salah satunya I Nyoman Suanda yang sudah menekuni usaha membuat batu bata merah yang biasanya digunakan untuk membuat bangunan. Usaha yang sudah digelutinya puluhan tahun ini memang dulu hanya dengan modal pas-pasan. Tetapi sekarang melihat permintaan akan batu bata yang meningkat karena ramainya pembangunan di daerah sekitarnya maka Nyoman Suanda berniat meningkatkan kapasitas hasil batu bata yang diproduksinya. DINARI merespon kebutuhan modal Nyoman Suanda setelah melihat permohonan yang masuk ke DINARI dimana rencananya pinjaman sebesar Rp.4.000.000,- dengan jangka waktu 12 bulan dan pembayaran cicilan setiap bulan ini akan digunakan Nyoman Suanda untuk menambah modal baik untuk membeli bahan baku batu bata maupun untuk membayar karyawannya sebanyak 2 orang. Keuntungan yang diperoleh perbulannya mencapai Rp.2.000.000,- dimana harga dari batu bata per buahnya adalah Rp.400,- dan Nyoman Suanda mampu menjual batu bata sebanyak 5000 buah setiap bulannya. Dari usahanya ini, Nyoman Suanda mampu menghidupi istrinya yang hanya sebagai ibu rumah tangga serta mampu juga menyekolahkan ketiga anaknya di bangku SD.
texts.en:
An economic condition that corners people to the toughest direction forces people to work even harder. I Nyoman Suanda, who produces red bricks for construction, is one of them. He started his business tens of years ago with limited capital. Now because of the increase of demand from the growth of the surrounding areas, Nyoman wants to increase his red brick production capacity. DINARI responded to Nyoman Suanda’s capital need after reviewing the proposal. The proposal stated that the 4,000,000 IDR loan, paid in 12 monthly payments, will be used to purchase raw materials and to pay his two employees. His sales in each month is 2,000,000 IDR in which he can sell 5,000 bricks at the price of 400 IDR each. From this business Nyoman Suanda can support his wife and send his three children to elementary school.

Translated from Indonesian by Arliadi (Ludi) Mahadi, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: Buy materials and pay two employee

loans.name: Ly

texts.en: Ly L. was born in 1978 and a resident of Kompong Tom Province, Cambodia. She currently sells pasted-fish, meatballs, and dried-fish at the market. She started this business a long time ago. She looks after of two children, both of whom are teenagers and attend school. To help meet the family's living expenses, her husband works as a motorcycle taxi driver. He also assists his wife with selling fish. To reduce the cost of transportation in the business, L. is applying for a loan to purchase a motorcycle. The motorcycle will be used to transport fish.

loans.use: To purchase a motorcycle

loans.name: Seng

texts.en: Seng K., 57 years old, is a vegetable seller from Kompong Tom Province. She runs her business in the area of the Psa Kompong Tom Market and sells different kinds of vegetables like cabbages, potatoes, and morning glories. She currently earns an average of $2 a day and has been running the business for more than three years. K. is married to Mr. Nghem Khoun who is a motorcycle taxi driver and also works with her in selling vegetables. She now has five children, four of whom are single and the other one is married and lives away from home. Two of her single children (one son and one daughter) are employed: her son is a electric repairer and her daughter is a garment worker in Phnom Penh City. K. has requested a loan to buy a motorcycle for her children to ride to work.

loans.use: To buy a motorcycle for her children to ride to work

loans.name: Hean

texts.en:
Hean Y. is 34 years old and is a resident of Kompong Tom Province, where she owns a little store outside of her house, where she sells groceries for daily income. With the business, she can earn around US$ 2 per day, and she has been running this store since 2007.

Y. is married to Mr. Khout Nghon, 42, who makes a living raising pigs from home and also is a local palm climber. With the palm climbing, he can tap palm juice from palm trees, boiling it to make palm sugar or turning it into palm wine for sale. The couple has five children; all of them are single and still under their care.

Y. is applying for a loan as capital to collect rice from farmers to store and re-sell for a profit and to buy piglets for her husband to raise.

loans.use: to collect rice from farmers to store and re-sell for a profit

loans.name: Hai

texts.en:
Hai L., 40, lives in Siem Reap province, Cambodia where she owns farmland and grows vegetable crops, growing cabbages, which she can plant twice a year. She is married and has three children; all of them are single and are students. Her husband's name is Chea Khout, 46, and he is a staff member of Concern Organization and currently gets a salary of US$ 210 per month.

In view of the fact that vegetable growing is L.'s main source of income to sustain her family’s, and in order to help her vegetable production, Hai L. is applying for a loan to buy a pump to pump water and some fertilizer to serve for growing vegetables. (L.'s husband is pictured on the farmland.)

loans.use: to buy a pump to pump water and some fertilizer

loans.name: Chear

texts.en: Chear K., 37 years old and married with one child, lives with his wife in Prey Chor District, Kampong Cham Province, Cambodia, where he typically earns $9 per day working at the local market as a butcher. His wife works as vegetable seller at the same place and contributes all of her wages to the household. Their child is a student at the nearby school. This couple hopes to use part of the loan to purchase a cow to expand the butcher business.

loans.use: To expand the butcher business.

loans.name: Chet

texts.en:
Chet P. is 65 years old and lives with her husband, Som Chhen, 75, (shown in the photo) in Prey Chor District, Kampong Cham Province. She and her husband have a business selling natural medicines in the village, earning a daily profit of about $2. They have developed a good clientèle, as people who live in the province depend more upon natural medicines than commercial drugs. This couple has one child.

Chet is requesting a loan of $700 to purchase a horse and cart for her son to operate a taxi. This will provide more income to improve the family's standard of living.

loans.use: To purchase a horse and cart.

loans.name: Thoch

texts.en: Thoch L. and her husband live with their two children in Prey Chor District, Kampong Cham Province, Cambodia. Thoch, 39, and her husband work in construction building houses and can make about $4 on an average day. She hopes to use this loan to purchase a horse and cart in order to operate a taxi.

loans.use: To purchase a horse and cart to operate a taxi.
